titleStmt.title: An Ansvver to the late Memorial of the Count d'Avaux, ambassadour extraordinary of France in a memorial presented to the States General by the Marquiss De Castell Moncayo, envoy extraordinary of Spain on the 3d of May (84.) at the Hague.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
